description: Adversaries may delete or remove built-in operating system data and turn off services designed to aid in the recovery of a corrupted system to prevent recovery. Author: frack113. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
name: Deletes Backup Files
query: (process.executable:*cmd.exe AND file.path:(*.VHD OR *.bac OR *.bak OR *.wbcat OR *.bkf OR *.set OR *.win OR *.dsk))
